meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>detain</kanji> your <kanji>study</kanji> and take it away to a foreign place. That foreign place is having you <vocabulary>study abroad</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. The reading for 留 is the りゅう version. You can remember this because <reading>Ryu</reading> (りゅう) from street fighter is doing a study abroad program to learn more karate.
